医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
昆士兰大学研究显示，房颤与高死亡率和住院率有关根据昆士兰大学的研究，在澳大利亚和新西兰，45% 的因心房颤动 (AF) 入院的患者会在十年内死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Atrial-fibrillation-linked-to-high-mortality-and-hospitalization-rates-UQ-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Atrial-fibrillation-linked-to-high-mortality-and-hospitalization-rates-UQ-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0a5b086-4d6c-433e-963f-ca8bcef9a769 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 22:17:06 -0400 Atrial fibrillation linked to high mortality and hospitalization rates, UQ study shows
呼出气可能是抗生素监测的一个有前途的途径在西班牙巴塞罗那（4 月 27 日至 30 日）举行的 ESCMID 全球大会（前身为 ECCMID）上，呼出气可能是非常有前途的替代血液的抗生素治疗监测替代品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Exhaled-breath-may-be-a-promising-avenue-for-antibiotic-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Exhaled-breath-may-be-a-promising-avenue-for-antibiotic-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2aaad04a-1eb6-4ef4-a853-54118bda3065 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 22:10:13 -0400 Exhaled breath may be a promising avenue for antibiotic monitoring
研究发现医院厕所藏有多重耐药“超级细菌”英国医院厕所的地板、天花板、门把手和其他表面发现了致病细菌和真菌，包括多重耐药“超级细菌”，其中病人厕所受影响最严重，ESCMID全球大会（原ECCMID）西班牙巴塞罗那（4 月 27 日至 30 日）将听取意见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Hospital-toilets-harbor-multi-drug-pressive-superbugs-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Hospital-toilets-harbor-multi-drug-pressive-superbugs-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3063744b-c88a-459a-afe7-fb0e1e099447 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 22:05:00 -0400 Hospital toilets harbor multi-drug resistant "superbugs", study finds
研究表明，年龄和性别会影响抗菌素耐药性水平在今年的欧洲临床微生物学和传染病大会（ECCMID 2024，巴塞罗那，4 月 27 日至 30 日）上提出的新研究表明，抗菌药物 (AMR) 耐药性水平随年龄和性别而变化，尤其是年龄和性别之间存在显着差异。国家内部。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Age-and-sex-impact-antimicrobial-resistance-levels-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Age-and-sex-impact-antimicrobial-resistance-levels-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa858a9e-f8d2-4945-9644-8e114bdb652d Mon, 29 Apr 2024 21:55:41 -0400 Age and sex impact antimicrobial resistance levels, research shows
多角恋青年经历耻辱和更严重的抑郁症状虽然一夫多妻制在成年人中越来越明显，但青少年中也存在这种现象，一项新的研究表明，随之而来的耻辱也同样存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Polyamorous-youth-experience-stigma-and-higher-depressive-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Polyamorous-youth-experience-stigma-and-higher-depressive-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f2a92b3-7fc0-4d87-a0da-e5714d9fabfa Mon, 29 Apr 2024 21:51:40 -0400 Polyamorous youth experience stigma and higher depressive symptoms
研究显示，八分之一的成年人喜欢强烈的酸味对于大多数人来说，咬一口柠檬会让他们皱起眉头，渴望失去酸味，但宾夕法尼亚州立大学研究人员的一项新研究显示，大约八分之一的成年人喜欢强烈的酸味。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/One-in-eight-adults-like-intensely-sour-sensations-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/One-in-eight-adults-like-intensely-sour-sensations-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dce35cf-094c-4115-b50f-6845955a6f6d Mon, 29 Apr 2024 21:46:29 -0400 One in eight adults like intensely sour sensations, study reveals
STRONG STAR Consortium 获得 1700 万美元用于创伤性脑损伤和心理健康研究在最近一轮拨款中，位于圣安东尼奥的德克萨斯大学健康科学中心（UT Health San Antonio）的 STRONG STAR 联盟被美国国防部选中，获得总计 1700 万美元的资金，以启动 8 个新项目。研究项目侧重于创伤性脑损伤和心理健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/STRONG-STAR-Consortium-awarded-2417M-for-traumatic-brain-injury-and-psychological-health-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/STRONG-STAR-Consortium-awarded-2417M-for-traumatic-brain-injury-and-psychological-health-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b01e025d-98b4-469c-afc5-967e6755a55b Mon, 29 Apr 2024 21:41:05 -0400 STRONG STAR Consortium awarded $17M for traumatic brain injury and psychological health research
新的卡波西肉瘤小鼠模型可能是药物开发的关键北卡罗来纳大学莱恩伯格综合癌症中心的研究人员经过数十年的研究努力，开发出了一种卡波西肉瘤小鼠模型，该模型可能是开发治疗该疾病的新药的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/New-Kaposi-sarcoma-mouse-model-could-be-key-to-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/New-Kaposi-sarcoma-mouse-model-could-be-key-to-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8183c44e-ae0e-4309-8a34-1dbf1bdcc858 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 21:37:21 -0400 New Kaposi sarcoma mouse model could be key to drug development
研究发现 FDA 批准的手术机器人趋向自主化《npj Digital Medicine》中的一项系统综述根据 FDA 批准的手术机器人的自主水平对它们进行了分类，强调随着这些系统向更高的自主性发展，需要标准化的定义和更大的监管清晰度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/FDA-approved-surgical-robots-trend-toward-autonomy-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/FDA-approved-surgical-robots-trend-toward-autonomy-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b347aed-a916-429c-a2d8-07b2058aa069 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 21:23:00 -0400 FDA-approved surgical robots trend toward autonomy, study finds
乳腺癌发病机制中关键基因的遗传关联乳腺癌仍然是一个重大的全球健康问题，需要进一步探索其遗传基础和潜在的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Genetic-associations-of-key-genes-in-breast-cancer-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Genetic-associations-of-key-genes-in-breast-cancer-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c10c7ae2-aea6-4aba-a347-90bfed980c87 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 15:50:00 -0400 Genetic associations of key genes in breast cancer pathogenesis
